```{r}
# import libraries
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
seq(from=-10, to=10, by = 0.05) %>%
  expand.grid(x=., y=.) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=(x^2+ pi * cos(y)^2), y=(y + pi * sin(x)))) +
    geom_point(alpha=.1, shape=20, size=1, color="black") +
    theme_void() +
    coord_fixed()
```
